message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly beneficial for you, given its value.  I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product. I am willing to pay $10,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product offers you significant value worth a bit more. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I see your point, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to increase my offer to $10,500.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  Let's close this deal. How about $10,800?
